text: The British television soap opera Crossroads had its original run from 1964 to 1988 and featured a wide range of characters. The only character to persist throughout the whole twenty-four years was Jill Richardson, played by Jane Rossington, although Diane Lawton (Susan Hanson) was present in most of the run. ==Characters: Original== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
